comments.body: Quote from: Divine Casly on May 25, 2023, 09:01:08 AMQuote from: Timelord2067 on May 25, 2023, 08:59:37 AMQuote from: Divine Casly on May 25, 2023, 07:59:34 AMQuote from: Timelord2067 on May 18, 2023, 11:05:06 AMCollateral? I propose 20% for the interestYou do understand you are offering $7,200 worth of disposable crypto currency as collateral?Yes I understand.That's good.  You just need to find an escrow that will hold the funds.Quote from: Divine Casly on May 25, 2023, 09:20:07 AMDo we have a deal ?Not quite.  Why don't you just dispose of the crypto if you have that much to offer?
